title: LF Diamond+ Top laner
body:
Our Team has almost Completed our roaster, but we are still missing one of the most important parts, A Top Laner. by the looks of the forums, a Diamond+ top laner is quite rare, but why choose us over the other teams?. 

Our team is made up and quite skilled players (Diamond 3, Diamond 4, Challenger and Diamond 1) ,who has play with each other for weeks now.
We Provide Great management and a friendly environment in which we can improve as a team
All Winnings will your to keep, Riot points, gaming gear etc
We Will be Entering in the OOL and AIming for the OCS and be on.

If interested add me Aoex and More information will be given

Cheers
